reviews.review: It makes you FEEL like Batman
If you want to forget about your life and get lost in a game. Then this is the game for you.

Coming up on the tail end of 1.6 and playing through source for years. I love the hell outta this game, the new danger zone mode is really rad too.

I mean, its fuckin free now and prime is only 15 bucks.

Muito Bom , recomendo pra todos da steam!

Это моя любимая игра. Здесь мне нравится всё. Графика, анимация стрельбы, скины. Также мне нравиться, что можно юзать всякие фишки баги. Я могу целыми днями задротить в эту игру и угарать вместе со своими друзьями.

Highly recommended as it has been around in one form or another for 20 years.(Beta, 1.6, Condition Zero, Source, Global Offensive)
Though it does have it's issues with some accuracy and hackers and some toxic trolls out to ruin it for everyone else. I still enjoy and play daily to weekly.

Pretty much the GOAT. An occasionally toxic community doesn't detract away from how mechanically tight this game has become, thanks to persistent attention from its developers.

This game is all about competitive playing and a lot of map knowledge. You have to share information to become a better team. Knowing movement, recoil patterns and callouts are a part of how to play the game. 

Overall good game, very guns and many intense games.
игра-говно, с каждым обновлением всё хуже, ничего нового, никому не советую.
